Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, south of the Open Air Fish Market.
Room.LongDescription: The Leviathan Fishery provides a number of freshly caught fish and other seafood in their open air market to the public on a daily basis. The demand for fish is not real strong as there is only one major fish seller in town. However, a fresh fish now and then is an excellent change from beef and venison, especially during the colder months when meat is scarce.
